title: Shell Quest
description: Introducing I Can Read Comics, a brand-new early reader line that familiarizes children with the world of graphic novel storytelling and encourages visual literacy in emerging readers.A little slug just wants to fit in in this Level Three I Can Read Comic by debut author-illustrator, Steph Waldo.One day, a little slug spots two critters in the backyard who look just like herâ€¦ except they have shells! Gasp! Slug thinks she needs a shell of her own to fit in, but finding one is a lot harder than it sounds.Introducing Tiny Tales, a new I Can Read COMIC series featuring very small stories with even smaller stars!Shell Quest is a Level Three I Can Read Comic, a more complex graphic novel story perfect for the independent comics reader.
author: Steph Waldo
